title: Smart Tooth Brush Botnets Are Fake News, For Now...
description:
In this video I discuss how a fake story about a smart toothbrush botnet used for DDoS attacks against a Swiss company went viral.  The story is not real but the concept of a botnet made up of hijacked smart personal hygiene devices is becoming closer to reality each day as IoT becomes devices more common.
